/*This must return all ACTIVITY2 which are pending but ready to be activated along with the associated assignments*/ CREATE PROCEDURE [Get_pending_ready_activity2](@WBS_ID CHAR(32), @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL) AS BEGIN DECLARE @now DATETIME DECLARE @now_n INT DECLARE @items TABLE ( ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default, [type] VARCHAR(32) COLLATE database_default, [state] VARCHAR(32) COLLATE database_default, date_start_sched DATETIME ) DECLARE @ACTIVITIES TABLE( ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default PRIMARY KEY)
EXEC [innovator].[Business_calendar_compile_check] @TZ_NAME
SET @now = Getutcdate() SET @now_n = (SELECT VALUE FROM [innovator].[Business_day_number](@now, @TZ_NAME))
INSERT @ACTIVITIES SELECT ID FROM Select_activities(@WBS_ID)
INSERT @ITEMS SELECT A1.ID, 'Activity2', A2.STATE, A2.DATE_START_SCHED FROM @ACTIVITIES A1, ACTIVITY2 A2 WHERE ( A1.ID = A2.ID ) AND ( A2.state = 'Pending' ) AND ( A2.DATE_START_SCHED IS NOT NULL ) AND ( Abs((SELECT VALUE FROM [innovator].[Business_day_number](A2.DATE_START_SCHED, @TZ_NAME))) <= Abs(@now_n) )
-- business day number is negative when it's non work day INSERT @ITEMS SELECT ID, 'Activity2 Assignment', STATE, NULL FROM ACTIVITY2_ASSIGNMENT WHERE SOURCE_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM @ITEMS) AND state = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM @ITEMS END
